wikipedia_page.main: Robert David Louis Dudley-Jones (born 26 May 1952) is a former Welsh cricketer who played for Glamorgan from 1972 to 1974. He was a right-arm medium pace bowler and right-handed batsman.

link_mentions.page: List of Glamorgan County Cricket Club players
response: * Bob Dudley-Jones (1972–1974) : R. D. L. Dudley–Jones
